channel.title: CVE Feed for ArduPilot -- APWeb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ArduPilot -- APWeb

item.title: CVE-2022-28711|2024-08-03T06:03:52.376Z -- ardupilot -- apweb
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the cgi.c unescape functionality of ArduPilot APWeb master branch 50b6b7ac - master branch 46177cb9. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.
